Name: Soul Burst
Self Effect: You have advantage on your next basic attack made before the end of your next turn, and its critical hit threshold is reduced by 3.

Name: Strange Symbiosis
Self Effect: Transfer all absorption to dual. Gain 6 + Presence absorption.
Dual Effect: Make a Focus attack. If you hit, transfer all absorption from dual. Grant 6 + Presence absorption.

Name: Agonizing Pulse
Self Effect: Remove all afflictions. 1 point of umbral damage per stack removed.
Dual Effect: Remove all afflictions. 1 point of umbral damage per stack removed.

Name: Boiling Rage
Self Effect: Gain 6 + Presence stacks of rage. For the duration of this effect, your critical hit threshold is reduced by half the number of stacks of rage that you have.
Dual Effect: Gain 6 + Presence stacks of rage. For the duration of this effect, your critical hit threshold is reduced by half the number of stacks of rage that you have.

Name: Careful Erasure
Self Effect: Become invisible until the end of the next turn. Take the Hide aciton.

Name: Cleansing Pulse
Self Effect: Treat action. Add 1 absorption for each stack of affliction removed, or 2 for each ailment.
Dual Effect: Treat action. Add 1 absorption for each stack of affliction removed, or 4 for each ailment.

Name: Dark Pact
Self Effect: You lose 1d12 + Presence life. Gain three times that much absorption.
Dual Effect: Make a Focus attack against your dual. If you hit, deal 1d12 + Presence umbral damage to them and they gain three times that much absorption.

Name: Ethereal Elopement
Dual Effect: Teleport up to 2 tiles if you hit.

Name: Insiduous Whispers
Self Effect: Gain two stacks of crazed. For the duration of this effect, apply one stack of crazed to any creature that you hit with a basic attack.
Dual Effect: Apply two stacks of crazed. For the duration of this effect, apply one stack of crazed to any creature that your dual hits with a basic attack.

Name: Involuntary Dance
Self Effect: For the duration of the effect, whenever your dual moves by any means (other than this effect), you move in unison.
Dual Effect: For the duration of the effect, whenever you move by any means (other than this effect), your dual moves in unison.

Name: Private Moment
Self Effect: Invisible to all creatures other than your dual until the end of your next turn.
Dual Effect: Invisible to all creatures other than you until the end of your next turn.

Name: Shared Senses
Self Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you share your dual’s senses, and have advantage on all attacks made against other creatures in your dual's zone of control.
Dual Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you share your dual’s senses, and have advantage on all attacks made against other creatures in your dual's zone of control.
